remarks: This lemma is used to prove the existence of a function p as in Lemma 1 [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 90: p is in the subalgebra, such that 0 <= p <= 1, p_(t_0) = 0, and p > 0 on T - U. Here ` ( q `` i ) ` is used to represent p_(t_i) in the paper.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
